biotools.summary: A Quality Control, Visualization, and Statistics Pipeline for Multiple Omics Datatypes. This R package provides functionality for quality control processing, statistical analysis and visualization of mass spectrometry (MS) omics data, in particular proteomic (either at the peptide or the protein level; isobaric labeled or unlabeled), lipidomic, and metabolomic data.

bioschemas.name: pmartR
